channel.title: Kind of a easy question please help?
channel.description:
Well im coding my server right now and no one ever ansered the question please someone do i really need help i have no idea how to move my objects someone please tell me how to change the cords and what file its in also what i gotta search 2 find it
(Sorry im a nub) just started coding 4 days ago

item.title: Kind of a easy question please help?
item.dc:creator: @Pluck Pluck
item.description:
@Pluck wrote:

Hey nice to know and welcome you to java coding 101. Lol jk Anyways on to business

Find the item you want to move in game

Type ::Coords ::mypos anything to find the coords of that item,

Go to client.java in the source, and search those coords
It will come up, in game find the spot where you want to put it and find the coords of it

Than change those coords to the new ones

Add me on MSN pl0x@live.com

For anymore help

Read full topic
item.source: Kind of a easy question please help?
